'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Non-functional
'Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.': Functional
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Non-functional
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Non-functional
'Rreports must be easy to generate. eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)': Non-functional
'The product must comply with Sarbanes-Oxley.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.': Non-functional
'The product shall be easy to learn by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. The product shall be learned with two days onsite training': Non-functional
'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.': Functional
'Each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owner’s page': Non-functional
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall manipulate and view business data. Users will not have direct access to data files or databases.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical lab section for an existing clinical class into the System.': Functional
'Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify the preferred sequence of classes for a given cohort.': Functional
'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.': Non-functional
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Non-functional
'The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.': Functional
'Users shall be able to reach the ‘add’ ‘drop’ and ‘trade player’ pages with one click from the team owner’s page.': Non-functional
'PME Subsystem shall allow keeping submenus within menus and products within submenus in a managed and persisted order.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database': Non-functional
'If the leads score falls within the medium average then it will be set for manual verification by an Enrollment Coordinator through the eleads system.': Functional
'The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.': Non-functional
'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Non-functional
'The system shall interface with the faculty central server.': Non-functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The product will be able to delete conference rooms.': Functional
'System shall let customers cancel their account process shall take no longer than 2 minutes. Database will mark the account as inactive and user will not be able to log into the website.': Non-functional
'Classes for a given cohort shall not conflict with regards to the time and day that they are offered.': Functional
'The system shall offer a display of all the Events in the exercise.': Functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Non-functional
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Non-functional
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional
'The system shall allow modification of the display.': Functional
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Non-functional
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional
'The Disputes application shall be available 24x7x365 with the exception of the following scheduled maintenance windows. Monday – Saturday 3:00am to 4:00am EST Sunday 1:00amd to 5:00am EST': Non-functional
'The report of needed classes shall include (but not be limited to) classes to be offered number of sections needed number of labs needed and room types needed.': Functional
'The system shall offer the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'No lead evaluation will complete in a time period longer than 25 seconds for 97% of all leads processed.': Non-functional
'System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes. Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional
'The system shall allow a Program Administrator or Nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section.': Functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.': Functional
'If projected the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen 90% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100': Non-functional
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary of the system log.'

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional
Here are a few examples: 
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional
'The product shall generate a CMA report in an acceptable time.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by Regulation E and Regulation Z that govern credit card disputes processing.': Non-functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.': Functional
'Website shall allow the Izogn administrator to approve a review posted by a customer.': Functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add clinical classes or sections to a sequence of classes': Functional
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting cohorts including but not limited to changes to the sequence for a cohort’s program of study and changes to a given week’s schedule (lab cancelled this week due to instructor illness).': Functional
'The PHP code will comply with PEAR standards.': Non-functional
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Non-functional
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Non-functional
'If a lead is scored to the high range the system will supply the lead data and score to the enterprise system.': Functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications': Non-functional
'Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds unless noted by an exception below.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.': Non-functional
'The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds': Non-functional
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Non-functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.': Functional
'Daily usage statistics should be logged and accessible by the administrator.': Functional

'The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.': Functional
'Users shall be able to reach the ‘add’ ‘drop’ and ‘trade player’ pages with one click from the team owner’s page.': Non-functional
'PME Subsystem shall allow keeping submenus within menus and products within submenus in a managed and persisted order.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database': Non-functional
'If the leads score falls within the medium average then it will be set for manual verification by an Enrollment Coordinator through the eleads system.': Functional
'The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.': Non-functional
'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Non-functional
'The system shall interface with the faculty central server.': Non-functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The product will be able to delete conference rooms.': Functional
'System shall let customers cancel their account process shall take no longer than 2 minutes. Database will mark the account as inactive and user will not be able to log into the website.': Non-functional
'Classes for a given cohort shall not conflict with regards to the time and day that they are offered.': Functional
'The system shall offer a display of all the Events in the exercise.': Functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Non-functional
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Non-functional
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional
'The system shall allow modification of the display.': Functional
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Non-functional
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional
'The Disputes application shall be available 24x7x365 with the exception of the following scheduled maintenance windows. Monday – Saturday 3:00am to 4:00am EST Sunday 1:00amd to 5:00am EST': Non-functional
'The report of needed classes shall include (but not be limited to) classes to be offered number of sections needed number of labs needed and room types needed.': Functional
'The system shall offer the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'No lead evaluation will complete in a time period longer than 25 seconds for 97% of all leads processed.': Non-functional
'System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes. Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional
'The system shall allow a Program Administrator or Nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section.': Functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.': Functional
'If projected the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen 90% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100': Non-functional
'A secondary database will be used to store historical statistics and data.'

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional
Here are a few examples: 
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional
'The product shall generate a CMA report in an acceptable time.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by Regulation E and Regulation Z that govern credit card disputes processing.': Non-functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.': Functional
'Website shall allow the Izogn administrator to approve a review posted by a customer.': Functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add clinical classes or sections to a sequence of classes': Functional
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting cohorts including but not limited to changes to the sequence for a cohort’s program of study and changes to a given week’s schedule (lab cancelled this week due to instructor illness).': Functional
'The PHP code will comply with PEAR standards.': Non-functional
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Non-functional
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Non-functional
'If a lead is scored to the high range the system will supply the lead data and score to the enterprise system.': Functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications': Non-functional
'Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds unless noted by an exception below.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.': Non-functional
'The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds': Non-functional
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Non-functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.': Functional
'Daily usage statistics should be logged and accessible by the administrator.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Letters application. This will allow the Disputes application to request letters as part of the dispute initiation and dispute follow up process. All letter requests must be sent to the Print Letter Utility application.': Non-functional
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional
'The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.': Non-functional
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Non-functional
'The product shall adhere to the corporate Architecture guidelines': Non-functional
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Non-functional
'Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.': Functional
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Non-functional
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Non-functional
'Rreports must be easy to generate. eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)': Non-functional
'The product must comply with Sarbanes-Oxley.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.': Non-functional
'The product shall be easy to learn by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. The product shall be learned with two days onsite training': Non-functional
'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.': Functional
'Each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owner’s page': Non-functional
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall manipulate and view business data. Users will not have direct access to data files or databases.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical lab section for an existing clinical class into the System.': Functional
'Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify the preferred sequence of classes for a given cohort.': Functional

'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'No lead evaluation will complete in a time period longer than 25 seconds for 97% of all leads processed.': Non-functional
'System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes. Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional
'The system shall allow a Program Administrator or Nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section.': Functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.': Functional
'If projected the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen 90% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100': Non-functional
'The Disputes System must prevent external users from requesting original receipts. Requests for original receipts are restricted to internal users.'

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional
Here are a few examples: 
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional
'The product shall generate a CMA report in an acceptable time.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by Regulation E and Regulation Z that govern credit card disputes processing.': Non-functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.': Functional
'Website shall allow the Izogn administrator to approve a review posted by a customer.': Functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add clinical classes or sections to a sequence of classes': Functional
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting cohorts including but not limited to changes to the sequence for a cohort’s program of study and changes to a given week’s schedule (lab cancelled this week due to instructor illness).': Functional
'The PHP code will comply with PEAR standards.': Non-functional
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Non-functional
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Non-functional
'If a lead is scored to the high range the system will supply the lead data and score to the enterprise system.': Functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications': Non-functional
'Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds unless noted by an exception below.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.': Non-functional
'The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds': Non-functional
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Non-functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.': Functional
'Daily usage statistics should be logged and accessible by the administrator.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Letters application. This will allow the Disputes application to request letters as part of the dispute initiation and dispute follow up process. All letter requests must be sent to the Print Letter Utility application.': Non-functional
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional
'The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.': Non-functional
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Non-functional
'The product shall adhere to the corporate Architecture guidelines': Non-functional
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Non-functional
'Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.': Functional
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Non-functional
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Non-functional
'Rreports must be easy to generate. eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)': Non-functional
'The product must comply with Sarbanes-Oxley.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.': Non-functional
'The product shall be easy to learn by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. The product shall be learned with two days onsite training': Non-functional
'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.': Functional
'Each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owner’s page': Non-functional
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall manipulate and view business data. Users will not have direct access to data files or databases.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical lab section for an existing clinical class into the System.': Functional
'Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify the preferred sequence of classes for a given cohort.': Functional
'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.': Non-functional
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Non-functional
'The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.': Functional
'Users shall be able to reach the ‘add’ ‘drop’ and ‘trade player’ pages with one click from the team owner’s page.': Non-functional
'PME Subsystem shall allow keeping submenus within menus and products within submenus in a managed and persisted order.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database': Non-functional
'If the leads score falls within the medium average then it will be set for manual verification by an Enrollment Coordinator through the eleads system.': Functional
'The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.': Non-functional
'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Non-functional
'The system shall interface with the faculty central server.': Non-functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The product will be able to delete conference rooms.': Functional
'System shall let customers cancel their account process shall take no longer than 2 minutes. Database will mark the account as inactive and user will not be able to log into the website.': Non-functional
'Classes for a given cohort shall not conflict with regards to the time and day that they are offered.': Functional
'The system shall offer a display of all the Events in the exercise.': Functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Non-functional
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Non-functional
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional
'The system shall allow modification of the display.': Functional
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Non-functional
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional
'The Disputes application shall be available 24x7x365 with the exception of the following scheduled maintenance windows. Monday – Saturday 3:00am to 4:00am EST Sunday 1:00amd to 5:00am EST': Non-functional

'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Non-functional
'If a lead is scored to the high range the system will supply the lead data and score to the enterprise system.': Functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications': Non-functional
'Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds unless noted by an exception below.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.': Non-functional
'The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds': Non-functional
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Non-functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.': Functional
'Daily usage statistics should be logged and accessible by the administrator.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Letters application. This will allow the Disputes application to request letters as part of the dispute initiation and dispute follow up process. All letter requests must be sent to the Print Letter Utility application.': Non-functional
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional
'The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.': Non-functional
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Non-functional
'The product shall adhere to the corporate Architecture guidelines': Non-functional
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Non-functional
'Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.': Functional
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Non-functional
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Non-functional
'Rreports must be easy to generate. eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)': Non-functional
'The product must comply with Sarbanes-Oxley.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.': Non-functional
'The product shall be easy to learn by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. The product shall be learned with two days onsite training': Non-functional
'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.': Functional
'Each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owner’s page': Non-functional
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall manipulate and view business data. Users will not have direct access to data files or databases.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical lab section for an existing clinical class into the System.': Functional
'Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify the preferred sequence of classes for a given cohort.': Functional
'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.': Non-functional
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Non-functional
'The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.': Functional
'Users shall be able to reach the ‘add’ ‘drop’ and ‘trade player’ pages with one click from the team owner’s page.': Non-functional
'PME Subsystem shall allow keeping submenus within menus and products within submenus in a managed and persisted order.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database': Non-functional
'If the leads score falls within the medium average then it will be set for manual verification by an Enrollment Coordinator through the eleads system.': Functional
'The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.': Non-functional
'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Non-functional
'The system shall interface with the faculty central server.': Non-functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The product will be able to delete conference rooms.': Functional
'System shall let customers cancel their account process shall take no longer than 2 minutes. Database will mark the account as inactive and user will not be able to log into the website.': Non-functional
'Classes for a given cohort shall not conflict with regards to the time and day that they are offered.': Functional
'The system shall offer a display of all the Events in the exercise.': Functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Non-functional
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Non-functional
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional
'The system shall allow modification of the display.': Functional
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Non-functional
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional
'The Disputes application shall be available 24x7x365 with the exception of the following scheduled maintenance windows. Monday – Saturday 3:00am to 4:00am EST Sunday 1:00amd to 5:00am EST': Non-functional
'The report of needed classes shall include (but not be limited to) classes to be offered number of sections needed number of labs needed and room types needed.': Functional
'The system shall offer the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'No lead evaluation will complete in a time period longer than 25 seconds for 97% of all leads processed.': Non-functional
'System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes. Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional
'The system shall allow a Program Administrator or Nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section.': Functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.': Functional
'If projected the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen 90% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100': Non-functional
'Every user of the system shall be authenticated and authorized.'

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional
Here are a few examples: 
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional
'The product shall generate a CMA report in an acceptable time.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by Regulation E and Regulation Z that govern credit card disputes processing.': Non-functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.': Functional
'Website shall allow the Izogn administrator to approve a review posted by a customer.': Functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add clinical classes or sections to a sequence of classes': Functional
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional

'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Non-functional
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Non-functional
'Rreports must be easy to generate. eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)': Non-functional
'The product must comply with Sarbanes-Oxley.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.': Non-functional
'The product shall be easy to learn by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. The product shall be learned with two days onsite training': Non-functional
'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.': Functional
'Each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owner’s page': Non-functional
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall manipulate and view business data. Users will not have direct access to data files or databases.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical lab section for an existing clinical class into the System.': Functional
'Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify the preferred sequence of classes for a given cohort.': Functional
'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.': Non-functional
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Non-functional
'The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.': Functional
'Users shall be able to reach the ‘add’ ‘drop’ and ‘trade player’ pages with one click from the team owner’s page.': Non-functional
'PME Subsystem shall allow keeping submenus within menus and products within submenus in a managed and persisted order.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database': Non-functional
'If the leads score falls within the medium average then it will be set for manual verification by an Enrollment Coordinator through the eleads system.': Functional
'The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.': Non-functional
'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Non-functional
'The system shall interface with the faculty central server.': Non-functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The product will be able to delete conference rooms.': Functional
'System shall let customers cancel their account process shall take no longer than 2 minutes. Database will mark the account as inactive and user will not be able to log into the website.': Non-functional
'Classes for a given cohort shall not conflict with regards to the time and day that they are offered.': Functional
'The system shall offer a display of all the Events in the exercise.': Functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Non-functional
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Non-functional
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional
'The system shall allow modification of the display.': Functional
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Non-functional
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional
'The Disputes application shall be available 24x7x365 with the exception of the following scheduled maintenance windows. Monday – Saturday 3:00am to 4:00am EST Sunday 1:00amd to 5:00am EST': Non-functional
'The report of needed classes shall include (but not be limited to) classes to be offered number of sections needed number of labs needed and room types needed.': Functional
'The system shall offer the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'No lead evaluation will complete in a time period longer than 25 seconds for 97% of all leads processed.': Non-functional
'System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes. Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional
'The system shall allow a Program Administrator or Nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section.': Functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.': Functional
'If projected the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen 90% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100': Non-functional
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.'

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional
Here are a few examples: 
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional
'The product shall generate a CMA report in an acceptable time.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by Regulation E and Regulation Z that govern credit card disputes processing.': Non-functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.': Functional
'Website shall allow the Izogn administrator to approve a review posted by a customer.': Functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add clinical classes or sections to a sequence of classes': Functional
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting cohorts including but not limited to changes to the sequence for a cohort’s program of study and changes to a given week’s schedule (lab cancelled this week due to instructor illness).': Functional
'The PHP code will comply with PEAR standards.': Non-functional
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Non-functional
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Non-functional
'If a lead is scored to the high range the system will supply the lead data and score to the enterprise system.': Functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications': Non-functional
'Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds unless noted by an exception below.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.': Non-functional
'The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds': Non-functional
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Non-functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.': Functional
'Daily usage statistics should be logged and accessible by the administrator.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Letters application. This will allow the Disputes application to request letters as part of the dispute initiation and dispute follow up process. All letter requests must be sent to the Print Letter Utility application.': Non-functional
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional

'The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database': Non-functional
'If the leads score falls within the medium average then it will be set for manual verification by an Enrollment Coordinator through the eleads system.': Functional
'The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.': Non-functional
'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Non-functional
'The system shall interface with the faculty central server.': Non-functional
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional
'The product will be able to delete conference rooms.': Functional
'System shall let customers cancel their account process shall take no longer than 2 minutes. Database will mark the account as inactive and user will not be able to log into the website.': Non-functional
'Classes for a given cohort shall not conflict with regards to the time and day that they are offered.': Functional
'The system shall offer a display of all the Events in the exercise.': Functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Non-functional
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Non-functional
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional
'The system shall allow modification of the display.': Functional
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Non-functional
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional
'The Disputes application shall be available 24x7x365 with the exception of the following scheduled maintenance windows. Monday – Saturday 3:00am to 4:00am EST Sunday 1:00amd to 5:00am EST': Non-functional
'The report of needed classes shall include (but not be limited to) classes to be offered number of sections needed number of labs needed and room types needed.': Functional
'The system shall offer the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'No lead evaluation will complete in a time period longer than 25 seconds for 97% of all leads processed.': Non-functional
'System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes. Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional
'The system shall allow a Program Administrator or Nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section.': Functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.': Functional
'If projected the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen 90% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100': Non-functional
'The product shall be platform independent.The product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform.'

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional
Here are a few examples: 
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional
'The product shall generate a CMA report in an acceptable time.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by Regulation E and Regulation Z that govern credit card disputes processing.': Non-functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.': Functional
'Website shall allow the Izogn administrator to approve a review posted by a customer.': Functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add clinical classes or sections to a sequence of classes': Functional
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting cohorts including but not limited to changes to the sequence for a cohort’s program of study and changes to a given week’s schedule (lab cancelled this week due to instructor illness).': Functional
'The PHP code will comply with PEAR standards.': Non-functional
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Non-functional
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Non-functional
'If a lead is scored to the high range the system will supply the lead data and score to the enterprise system.': Functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications': Non-functional
'Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds unless noted by an exception below.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.': Non-functional
'The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds': Non-functional
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Non-functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.': Functional
'Daily usage statistics should be logged and accessible by the administrator.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Letters application. This will allow the Disputes application to request letters as part of the dispute initiation and dispute follow up process. All letter requests must be sent to the Print Letter Utility application.': Non-functional
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional
'The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.': Non-functional
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Non-functional
'The product shall adhere to the corporate Architecture guidelines': Non-functional
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Non-functional
'Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.': Functional
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Non-functional
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Non-functional
'Rreports must be easy to generate. eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)': Non-functional
'The product must comply with Sarbanes-Oxley.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.': Non-functional
'The product shall be easy to learn by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. The product shall be learned with two days onsite training': Non-functional
'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.': Functional
'Each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owner’s page': Non-functional
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application shall manipulate and view business data. Users will not have direct access to data files or databases.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical lab section for an existing clinical class into the System.': Functional
'Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify the preferred sequence of classes for a given cohort.': Functional
'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.': Non-functional
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Non-functional
'The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.': Functional

'System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes. Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional
'The system shall allow a Program Administrator or Nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section.': Functional
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.': Functional
'If projected the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen 90% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100': Non-functional
'The product’s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer’s organization such as logo branding and identity'

Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional
Here are a few examples: 
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional
'The product shall generate a CMA report in an acceptable time.': Non-functional
'The Disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by Regulation E and Regulation Z that govern credit card disputes processing.': Non-functional
'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.': Functional
'Website shall allow the Izogn administrator to approve a review posted by a customer.': Functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add clinical classes or sections to a sequence of classes': Functional
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting cohorts including but not limited to changes to the sequence for a cohort’s program of study and changes to a given week’s schedule (lab cancelled this week due to instructor illness).': Functional
'The PHP code will comply with PEAR standards.': Non-functional
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Non-functional
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Non-functional
'If a lead is scored to the high range the system will supply the lead data and score to the enterprise system.': Functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications': Non-functional
'Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds unless noted by an exception below.': Non-functional
'The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.': Non-functional
'The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds': Non-functional
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Non-functional
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.': Non-functional
'The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.': Non-functional
'The system shall be used by realtors with no training.': Non-functional
'System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.': Functional
'Daily usage statistics should be logged and accessible by the administrator.': Functional
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Letters application. This will allow the Disputes application to request letters as part of the dispute initiation and dispute follow up process. All letter requests must be sent to the Print Letter Utility application.': Non-functional
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional
'The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.': Non-functional
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Non-functional
'The product shall adhere to the corporate Architecture guidelines': Non-functional
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Non-functional
'Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.': Functional
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Non-functional
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Non-functional
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Non-functional
'Rreports must be easy to generate. eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)': Non-functional
'The product must comply with Sarbanes-Oxley.': Non-functional
'The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.': Non-functional
'The product shall be easy to learn by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. The product shall be learned with two days onsite training': Non-functional
'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional

'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Non-functional

'Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.': Non-functional
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify the preferred sequence of classes for a given cohort.': Functional
'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.': Non-functional
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Non-functional
'The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.': Functional
'Users shall be able to reach the ‘add’ ‘drop’ and ‘trade player’ pages with one click from the team owner’s page.': Non-functional
'PME Subsystem shall allow keeping submenus within menus and products within submenus in a managed and persisted order.': Functional

'Classes for a given cohort shall not conflict with regards to the time and day that they are offered.': Functional
'The system shall offer a display of all the Events in the exercise.': Functional
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Non-functional
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Non-functional
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Non-functional

'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Non-functional
